title: The board is just the beginning
content: Lists and cards are the building blocks of organizing work on a Trello board. Grow from there with task assignments, timelines, productivity metrics, calendars, and more.

title: Cards contain everything you need
content: Trello cards are your portal to more organized work—where every single part of your task can be managed, tracked, and shared with teammates. Open any card to uncover an ecosystem of checklists, due dates, attachments, conversations, and more.

title: No-code automation
content: Let the robots do the work—so your team can focus on work that matters. With Trello’s built-in automation, Butler, reduce the number of tedious tasks (and clicks) on your project board by harnessing the power of automation across your entire team.

title: Integrate top work tools
content: Easily connect the apps your team already uses into your Trello workflow, or add a Power-Up that helps fine-tune one specific need. With hundreds of Power-Ups available, your team’s workflow wishes are covered.
